titleInfo.title: Jerry Clower and Jim Ed Brown at Tombstone Junction (fragments)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card fragments (blue and red on white) announcing Jerry Clower and Jim Ed Brown and the Gems at Tombstone Junction on July 11. These fragments would have been used as a "mattress" for another poster job.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
